00120 class CallGraphBuilder
00121 {
00122   public:
00123     CallGraphBuilder( SgProject *proj);
00125     void buildCallGraph();
00127     template<typename Predicate>
00128       void buildCallGraph(Predicate pred);

00139     //We map each function to the corresponding graph node

00148 class GetOneFuncDeclarationPerFunction :  public std::unary_function<SgNode*, Rose_STL_Container<SgNode*> >
00149 {
00150   public:
00151     result_type operator()(SgNode* node );

00153 
00154 template<typename Predicate>
00155   void
00156 CallGraphBuilder::buildCallGraph(Predicate pred)
00157 {
00158     Rose_STL_Container<FunctionData> callGraphData;
00159 
00160     //AS (09/23/06) Query the memory pool instead of subtree of project
00161     VariantVector vv(V_SgFunctionDeclaration);
00162     GetOneFuncDeclarationPerFunction defFunc;
00163     Rose_STL_Container<SgNode *> allFunctions = NodeQuery::queryMemoryPool(defFunc, &vv);
00164 
00165     ClassHierarchyWrapper classHierarchy(project);
00166     Rose_STL_Container<SgNode *>::iterator i = allFunctions.begin();
00167 
00168     graphNodes.clear();
00169     
00170     //Iterate through all the functions found and resolve all the call expressions in each function with a body
00171     while (i != allFunctions.end())
00172     {
00173         SgFunctionDeclaration* functionDeclaration = isSgFunctionDeclaration(*i);
00174         ROSE_ASSERT(functionDeclaration != NULL);
00175 
00176         // determining the in-class declaration
00177         if (isSgMemberFunctionDeclaration(functionDeclaration))
00178         {
00179             // always saving the in-class declaration, so we need to find that one
00180             SgDeclarationStatement *nonDefDeclInClass =
00181                     isSgMemberFunctionDeclaration(functionDeclaration->get_firstNondefiningDeclaration());
00182             // functionDeclaration is outside the class (so it must have a definition)
00183             if (nonDefDeclInClass)
00184                 functionDeclaration = isSgMemberFunctionDeclaration(nonDefDeclInClass);
00185         }
00186         else
00187         {
00188             // we need to have only one declaration for regular functions as well
00189             SgFunctionDeclaration *nonDefDecl = isSgFunctionDeclaration(functionDeclaration->get_firstNondefiningDeclaration());
00190             if (nonDefDecl)
00191                 functionDeclaration = nonDefDecl;
00192         }
00193 
00194         //AS(032806) Filter out functions based on criteria in predicate
00195         if (pred(functionDeclaration) == true)
00196         {
00197             FunctionData functionData(functionDeclaration, project, &classHierarchy);
00198             ROSE_ASSERT(functionData.functionDeclaration != NULL);
00199 
00200             callGraphData.push_back(functionData);
00201         }
00202         i++;
00203     }
00204 
00205     // Build the graph
00206     SgIncidenceDirectedGraph *returnGraph = new SgIncidenceDirectedGraph();
00207     ROSE_ASSERT(returnGraph != NULL);
00208 
00209     
00210     //Instantiate all the nodes in the graph, one for each function we found
00211     BOOST_FOREACH(FunctionData& currentFunction, callGraphData)
00212     {
00213         std::string functionName;
00214         ROSE_ASSERT(currentFunction.functionDeclaration);
00215         functionName = currentFunction.functionDeclaration->get_qualified_name().getString();
00216 
00217         // Generate a unique name to test against later
00218         SgFunctionDeclaration* id = currentFunction.functionDeclaration;
00219         SgDeclarationStatement *nonDefDeclInClass = isSgMemberFunctionDeclaration(id->get_firstNondefiningDeclaration());
00220         if (nonDefDeclInClass)
00221             ROSE_ASSERT(id == nonDefDeclInClass);
00222         SgGraphNode* graphNode = new SgGraphNode(functionName);
00223         graphNode->set_SgNode(currentFunction.functionDeclaration);
00224 
00225         if (SgProject::get_verbose() >= DIAGNOSTICS_VERBOSE_LEVEL)
00226         {
00227             std::cout << "Function: "
00228                     << currentFunction.functionDeclaration->get_scope()->get_qualified_name().getString() +
00229                     currentFunction.functionDeclaration->get_mangled_name().getString()
00230                     << " has declaration " << currentFunction.isDefined() << "\n";
00231         }
00232         
00233         graphNodes[currentFunction.functionDeclaration] = graphNode;
00234 
00235         returnGraph->addNode(graphNode);
00236     }
00237 
00238     if (SgProject::get_verbose() >= DIAGNOSTICS_VERBOSE_LEVEL)
00239         std::cout << "NodeList size: " << graphNodes.size() << "\n";
00240 
00241     //We have all the nodes. Now instantiate all the graph edges
00242     int totEdges = 0;
00243     BOOST_FOREACH(FunctionData& currentFunction, callGraphData)
00244     {
00245         ROSE_ASSERT(currentFunction.functionDeclaration != NULL);
00246         
00247         boost::unordered_map<SgFunctionDeclaration*, SgGraphNode*>::iterator iter
00248                 = graphNodes.find(currentFunction.functionDeclaration);
00249         ROSE_ASSERT(iter != graphNodes.end());
00250         SgGraphNode* startingNode = iter->second;
00251 
00252         Rose_STL_Container<SgFunctionDeclaration*> & functionCallees = currentFunction.functionList;
00253 
00254         BOOST_FOREACH(SgFunctionDeclaration* calleeDeclaration, functionCallees)
00255         {
00256                         ROSE_ASSERT(calleeDeclaration != NULL);
00257 
00258                         //This function has been filtered out
00259                         if (pred(calleeDeclaration) == false)
00260                         {
00261                                 continue;
00262                         }
00263 
00264                         iter = graphNodes.find(calleeDeclaration);
00265                         ROSE_ASSERT(iter != graphNodes.end());
00266                         SgGraphNode *endNode = iter->second;
00267 
00268                         if (returnGraph->checkIfDirectedGraphEdgeExists(startingNode, endNode) == false)
00269                         {
00270                                 ROSE_ASSERT(startingNode != NULL && endNode != NULL);
00271                                 returnGraph->addDirectedEdge(startingNode, endNode);
00272                         }
00273                         else if (SgProject::get_verbose() >= DIAGNOSTICS_VERBOSE_LEVEL)
00274                         {
00275                                 std::cout << "Did not add edge since it already exist" << std::endl;
00276                                 std::cout << "\tEndNode " << calleeDeclaration->get_name().str() << "\n";
00277                         }
00278 
00279             totEdges++;
00280         }
00281     }
00282     
00283     if (SgProject::get_verbose() >= DIAGNOSTICS_VERBOSE_LEVEL)
00284         std::cout << "Total number of edges: " << totEdges << "\n";
00285 
00286     graph = returnGraph;
00287 }
00288 
00289 // endif for CALL_GRAPH_H
00290 #endif
